 Promotion for Loyalty Membership on March, 8 Female Diamond Members stay in Hà Nội, and HCM city and new members stay at HCM city that will get a present which value VND 1.000.000 Time of promotion : From 05/03/2013 1. Program 1: Flower for Female Diamond Members who stay in Hà Nội, HCM city &#183; Benefits: Giving 1 bunch/basket/box of flowers which is value VND 1.000.000đ (including packing and shipping fee) on 07-08/03/2013 &#183; Quantity: Hà Nội 140 members ; HCM city 260 members &#183; Priority: o Diamond members, who were issued card, stay in Hà Nội and HCM city o Diamond members, who were not issued card, stay in Hà Nội and HCM city o If MF cannot give the present to all Diamond members (because we cannot contact or customer refuse to receive…), MF will give the present to Female Gold Members who stay in Hà Nội, HCM city with the priority of Accumulated Points (from the top to the bottom) until out of present 2. Program 2: Applicable for New High Class Members who are issued New Membership Card from 01-10/03/2013 and have the address of sending card is HCM city &#183; Benefits: Bonus VND 1.000.000 in the form of gift voucher (2 voucher value VND 300.000 + 2 voucher value VND 200.000) of JOJO and MAC fashion (City Fashion company, phone number : 08.62647100, website http:// www.thoitrangmac.com.vn , ) . &#183; By using the Voucher, you agree to be bound by terms and conditions as well as partners policies (get discount up to 40% value of goods) &#183; MAC stores at HCM City: o 167 Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, q3 o 39 Lê Văn Sỹ, Phú Nhuận o 379 Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, q3 o 199 Điện Biên phủ P.6 ,Q.3 o 465-467 Hai Bà Trưng Q.3 &#22269;&#38469;&#19977;&#20843;&#22919;&#22899;&#33410;
